content.question: According to the psychosocial theory of development, which of the following represents a question that might be asked by someone who is experiencing the stage of industry versus inferiority?

choices.label: Have I done a good job raising my children?
Am I fundamentally an introvert with an interest in a quiet life?
Have I lived a productive life?
Will I be able to learn to skate?

content.answer: Will I be able to learn to skate?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
